title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
OB: When clicking on a link in the welcome page, the clicked link is not selected when the user returns to the welcome page.
EB: Links should be selected when clicked, providing more context to the user when they return to the welcome page.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Make sure you get a welcome page when you restart (remove the welcome line in prefstore.ini of the workbench metadata).
2. Click on any link in the welcome page.

Expected result: The appropriate action is executed and the clicked link is selected when the user returns to the welcome page.
